name: Diadem [1] Blueprint
description: God's spokesman - exclusive hat for Archbishop

name: Diamond Galaxy
description: The brilliant radiance condensed into a diamond ring, guarding the most important agreement.

name: Diamond Ring [1]
description: A fine diamond ring. Wearing it makes you feel much proud.

name: Diamond Ring·Jupiter's Arrow
description: The love arrow has hit me. I offer my heart to you on one knee. >////<. (spend items to make one proposal)

name: Director of the voice club
description: It's finally over! Pick up the tall violin bag, avoid those annoying girls with quick pace, bypass couples who are going to leave, and quietly and skillfully pass through the director's office. Then the girl's destination will be insight! That's paradise! Girls are looking forward to the new track I will lead today! Yes, I'm the director of the voice club.

name: Dirk [2]
description: Knives used by a western country in ancient times.

name: Disguising Scroll
description: Hi, everyone, I am your new friend: Billboard. (After use, you can perfectly disguise as a…billboard?…)

name: Dish Pack A
description: A sealed dish pack. You cannot tell what is inside it from its appearance. Please be careful not to shake it!

name: Dish Pack B
description: A sealed dish pack. You cannot tell what is inside it from its appearance. Please be careful not to shake it!

name: Divine hand
description: Once upon a time, God made men out of the earth, and created women from the ribs of men. Later, lured by snakes, human beings lost paradise and were exiled to the wilderness. The elder man farmed the land and the younger one grazed livestock. Generations of poets and philosophers have argued about the existence of what is called destiny.

name: Doflamingo Cape
description: It is said that the cloak is the favorite style of Wang III.

name: Doflamingo Cape [1]
description: It is said that the cloak is the favorite style of Wang III.

name: Dog Bandana
description: A super lovely new year headwear (limited version), it is said that wearing this item would bring good luck!

name: Dog Bandana Blueprint
description: A super lovely new year headwear (limited version), it is said that wearing this item would bring good luck!

name: Dog Teeth
description: These sharp canine teeth can be used as a material for making accessories.
